nodes.text: The Yagara system was a star system located in the Hadar sector of the galaxy's Mid Rim and Western Reaches regions. It was home to the Yagaran aleudrupe plant, as well as the origin point of the bounty hunter team known as the Yagaran Four.
The Yagara system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square L-17.
